# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int len[1000005];
int counts(string s,string awe)
{
	int n = 0;
	size_t pos = 0;
	while ( (pos = s.find(awe,pos)) != std::string::npos) {
		n++;
		pos += 1;
	}
	return n;
}

string to_string ( int Number )
  {
     ostringstream ss;
     ss.clear();
     ss << Number;
     return ss.str();
  }

int main()
{
	int ma = 1000001;
	string s;
	for(int i=1;i<ma;i++)
	{
		string tem = to_string(i);
		len[i] += len[i-1] + tem.length();
		s.append(tem);
	}
	int n,k,q;
	cin>>q;
	while(q--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		//cout<<s.substr(0,len[n])<<endl;
		cout<<counts(s.substr(0,len[n]),to_string(k)) <<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
